== Peruvayal (CT) (627430) ==

Peruvayal (CT) is a town in the [[Kozhikode]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 15.76 sq. km. and harbouring 6349 households with total population of 27598 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 12 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 427 km. Male population is 13471 and female population is 14127. Scheduled Caste population is 2351 and Scheduled Tribes population is 50. Census Location Code of the town is 627430<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 12 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 12 km. Railway station is at Kozhikode at a distance of 12 km.
